name: Depth Odissey
description:
Our Global game Jam 2022 based on the Duality theme! 

Confront yourself in a abissal little adventure fighting terribily cute monster!

How to play with CONTROLLER :

LS to move

D-pad to switch lanes

RT to attack

RB to change form

KEYBOARD:

WASD to move

LMB to attack

Up and Down Arrows to switch lanes. 

Spacebar to change form

GLHF!
